content: this pattern has a video tutorial to accompany left https //youtu be/j3g0jtgp09u right https //youtu be/bdxaj2ddbrk *this is your free version* why just buy one get more patterns and save more buy 2 for 20% off buy 3 for 30% off buy 4 or more for 40% off youtube https //www youtube com/channel/ucu27-xjgrqpr3pxsngbi3ig like us on facebook https //www facebook com/jolieknotscrochet/ view_public_f… join the jolie knots crochet community facebook group https //www facebook com/groups/2541380872756259/ instagram https //www instagram com/jolieknotscrochet/ hl=en description worked top down this uniquely shaped shawl give tons of room and warmth up front while still keeping length in the back pockets and hood worked separately and attached material 4 weight yarn 5 5mm hook 1 stitch marker i used 5 5mm hook i love this yarn - hobby lobby in mint lace 1 800yds pocket and hood optional pocket 35yds/20g each hood 300yds/165g gauge 13dc 4 inches x 3 row 2 inches it is recommended you block your project so that you can get a nice even drape measurements back of the neck down to the front of the shawl 31 inches lightly blocked length from the back of the neck down to the back point at the bottom 37 inches lightly blocked you can do more or less repeats to get a longer or shorter shawl abbreviations chain - chain double_crochet - double_crochet single_crochet - single_crochet skip - skip st - stitch chsp - chain space stdc - stacked single_crochet to create double_crochet tutorial https //youtu be/gyilubwkvl8 space - side puff double_crochet in chsp working over double_crochet post just made yo pull up a loop 4 times yo pull through all loops
